name: A Year Ago
author: Robert Jones

sections.description: This plug-in will create a link to a single post that was published exactly one year prior to the post currently being viewed. For example, if the post being viewed was published 2011-01-15, the plug-in will create a link to the post published 2010-01-15.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload ayearago.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php ayearago(); ?> in your theme’s header.php file.
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • Ported from Pixelpost. See plug-in for more information.

short_description: Creates a link to the post from exactly one year ago. Works only with one-post-per-day blogs and is designed primarily for photoblogs.
description: This plug-in will create a link to a single post that was published exactly one year prior to the post currently being viewed. For example, if the post being viewed was published 2011-01-15, the plug-in will create a link to the post published 2010-01-15.
